summary: This document is an internal email discussing the preparation of ISDAs (International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements) related to Jeffrey Epstein. It mentions key individuals involved in the communication and the urgency of getting drafts completed. The email highlights the close coordination among team members at Deutsche Bank.
